#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
#include <cctype>
#include <stack>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int n;
	char infix[401];
	char rpn[401];
	stack<char> ops;

	scanf("%d", &n);

	for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
	{
		rpn[0] = '\0';

		scanf("%s", &infix);

		for (unsigned int j = 0; j < strlen(infix); j++)
		{
			if (isalpha(infix[j]))
			{
				strncat(rpn, &infix[j], 1);
			}
			else if (infix[j] == ')')
			{
				strncat(rpn, &ops.top(), 1);
				ops.pop();
			}
			else if (infix[j] != '(')
			{
				ops.push(infix[j]);
			}
		}

		printf("%s\n", rpn);
	}
}
